page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT AND SHOPS
page.content: Employment in CHAPEL ST.LEONARDS revoles almost entirely around the {tourist}industry.The Village centre is full of shops,cafes,arcades and small amusements,bed and breakfast residences and two hotels,the VINE hotel and the GRANGE hotel.Most of the shop owners live here all the year round and they holiday in the winter months,usually abroad.Alot of people come to work in the Village in the summer,helping in the arcades, shops and amusement parks.In the village centre there is also three estate agents,chemist,post office,building society and a hardware shops plus a shoe shop.These shops along with a food shop,butchers,newsagents and fish and chip shop stay open all the year. The "holiday bric-a-brac"shops close in October usually.
